actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to help prevent the occurrence of cancer resulting from the use of ultraviolet tanning lamps by providing sufficient information to consumers regarding the health risks associated with the use of such devices.
short_title: Tanning Transparency and Notification Act of 2012
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

summary.text: Tanning Transparency and Notification Act of 2012 - Directs the Commissioner of Food and Drugs (FDA) to carry out the recommendations made in the report submitted under the Food and Drug Administration Amendments Act of 2007 regarding the labeling of indoor tanning devices to provide information to consumers about the health risks posed by such devices.

titles.title: Tanning Transparency and Notification Act of 2012

A bill to help prevent the occurrence of cancer resulting from the use of ultraviolet tanning lamps by providing sufficient information to consumers regarding the health risks associated with the use of such devices.
